name: The Collection (Tori, Brother main, FrancisRave)
description:
The Collection is a point & click in a horror setup.

It was a normal day in a normal town until you found a weird invitation letter. You knew the address before even reading it, it's where stands that creepy abandoned mansion. Before you can throw the letter away, you find yourself facing that house, the front door wide open, inviting you in.

This game is a point & click, you go from screen to screen trying to get clues or items to solve puzzles. Only a mouse is required to play.

Left click to equip an item from your inventory or to interact with the environment.

Right click to unequip an item, skip dialogues, or to obtain more information about something.
(Look for the "?" icon).

Press Enter at any time to close the game.
(Your game saves automatically).

Once you restart the game, you can press the R key on the main screen to delete your save file.

This game was made specially for Darkangle during the "Secret santa game jam" (from 20.11.20 to 20.12.20)

- Made with GameMaker Studio 2 -
